**Describe the bug**


**Expected behavior**

Not reject all peers

Related comment https://github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/issues/4243#issuecomment-1183531691

Got a better stack trace there.
Seems we initialize a noise handshake w a peer id (optionally), and the peer id is also exchanged during the handshake.

Closing for now since this issue is not actionable. To collect more data on future cases:
- This PR will tell us the mismatched key https://github.com/ChainSafe/js-libp2p-noise/pull/273
- By enabling metrics we can track the frequency of this type of errors

@wemeetagain none of this metrics show up in our infra. How can noise metrics be enabled? https://github.com/ChainSafe/js-libp2p-noise/blob/master/src/metrics.ts
